reviews.review: The very base mechanics of this game have remained the same for years, but perks (you could call them abilities) tend to change over time and the devs kind of try to listen to the community. I've been having fun with this game for a while now, and I will continue to do so, for as long as it provides the entertainment of either chasing a survivor or being chased by the killer.
Muito bom jogo s√≥ uma coisa consegue deixar o jogo chatinho que s√£o os campers, fora isso nada a reclamar

Comprei pensando que jogar de killer seria o mais legal, mas jogar de sobrevivente principalmente com amigos √© muito divertido, recomendo principalmente se tiver com quem jogar.O melhor √© que mesmo "perdendo" voc√™ n√£o liga tanto.(Pelo menos pra mim √© assim)

I would definitely recommend this game to anybody who likes to step in bear traps, get a chainsaw up the ass, or is just in the mood to get a new monitor and break the old one.

        (If you couldn't tell, that is sarcasm, the game is good but what I said will definitely happen)

elegancia , entretiene bastante , si te gusta hacer sufrir a los de mas caz√°ndolos y mat√°ndolos, o sentir la adrenalina de escapar de un asesino xd
Its a difficult game to get into, but entertaining and thrilling at the same time.
Great fun either with friends or alone!
Muy buen juego para divertirse con amigos.

Considering it's the constant back and forth between either having survivors giving up in .2 seconds when they get placed on the hook, or the fact that the toxic killer community has caused to game to have such an inbalance because of the "pro players" who take all of their time to memorize map layout for juke outs. Either it's a match of being stalked, tunnel visioned, or camped the entire time, or it's a game that gets down in less than 5 minutes with no actual drive for enjoyment. It's comical how just because of a select group that spent weeks on end, the entire game got ruined for survivors because killers couldn't stop complaining about it being "too difficult."
Muy divertido para jugar con amigos :)

Tried many methods written in support. Nothing. People say this game has issues with OC/SLI GPUs. Like are you for real guys ? You release a game that has problems with OC cards which are like idk 50% of playerbase ?
